featured.text: It is an eco-friendly and biodegradable fiber.
This eco-friendly leather has clear 24 for the environment, compared to real leather and synthetic leathers.

definition.zh_def: 生態的；與環境保護有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to or concerned with the environment and the relationships between living organisms and their surroundings.
definition.example: The eco-friendly products are made from sustainable materials.
